title: Investigate 504 errors on payments API
steps: Confirm the scope of impact (regions, merchants, endpoints) using dashboards and recent tickets.
Check billing-api service metrics: CPU, memory, request latency, and error rate across regions.
Inspect database performance for the payments schema: slow queries, connection pool saturation, and locks.
Verify that all downstream dependencies (fraud checks, FX service) are healthy and not timing out.
If issue correlates with recent deploys, consider rolling back or enabling feature flag failsafes.
Communicate status in the incident channel and update the status page as needed.

title: Troubleshoot login failures after password reset
steps: Confirm the user flow: reset password link, password change, and subsequent login attempt.
Check auth-service logs around the reported time for token validation or session creation errors.
Validate cookie configuration (domain, SameSite, Secure) across web and mobile clients.
Ensure that old sessions are invalidated and that new sessions are created after the password reset.
If a regression is suspected, check the last auth-service deploy and related feature flags.
Provide the user with a clean logout and login flow, and confirm resolution.
